Description: ESP LTD MH-417 7-String Electric Guitar Black Satin Finish w/ Active EMG Pickups Click Photos to Enlarge Description Make/Model: LTD MH-417 Serial Number: L13051186 Location of Manufacture: China Scale Length: 25.5" Nut Width: 1 7/8 " Weight: 7.8lbs Finish Color: Satin black Pickup/Control Layout: 2 EMG pickups, 1 vol, 1 tone, 3 way toggle switch Neck Wood: Maple Fingerboard Wood: Rosewood Case: Does NOT include case Features: Active EMG 81-7 and 707 pickups, bound neck and headstock, black chrome hardware and Grover tuners Condition: In overall great shape with very few signs of use. The body itself has some light blemishes here and there, but nothing beyond some small scratches and scuffs from normal handling (see photos). The neck feels and plays great, with barely any wear at all in the frets. The headstock is also very clean, with only a few marks and dings, mostly on the edges (see photos). All electronics have been tested and are in working condition. Everything pictured is ready to be professionally packed and shipped. Comments: Very cool 7 string that is ready to rock! The active EMGs sound fantastic both clean and with a ton of gain. Black satin finish looks great but is also nice and understated. Stock # 01252019-01 JA JA All items shipped are fully insured.
